mapper.select: SELECT EXHIBITION_NO, TITLE, PLACE, MAIN_IMG, EX_DATE FROM EXHIBITION WHERE TO_DATE(SUBSTR(EX_DATE, 12), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= CURRENT_DATE

SELECT E.EXHIBITION_NO, E.TITLE, E.PLACE, E.MAIN_IMG, E.EX_DATE FROM EXHIBITION E JOIN (SELECT EXHIBITION_NO, COUNT(USER_NO) AS LIKE_COUNT FROM EXHIBITION_LIKE GROUP BY EXHIBITION_NO) L ON E.EXHIBITION_NO = L.EXHIBITION_NO WHERE TO_DATE(SUBSTR(E.EX_DATE, 12), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY L.LIKE_COUNT DESC FETCH FIRST 10 ROWS ONLY;
